channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Study Shows Air Pollution More Likely to Cause Cancer Than Smoking
item.description: Researchers at National Taiwan University have found 30 years of exposure to air pollution could be more cancerous than smoking a pack of cigarettes a day for the same amount of ti

item.title: Yilan Temple Festival Draws 5,000 Worshipers From Near and Far
item.description: A three-day temple festival in Yilan celebrating the Taoist deity Dongyue drew 5,000 worshipers with a banquet, firecrackers and other activities.

item.title: Toad Infestation Hits Reservoir in Central Taiwan
item.description: Invasive cane toads have appeared at an unfinished reservoir in central Taiwan.

item.title: Four Formosan Black Bear Nests Spotted in Central Taiwan
item.description: Researchers found the rare sight of bear nests woven from broken tree branches in Daxueshan National Forest Recreation Area. The Formosan black bear is endemic to Taiwan and is the
